import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a room"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/{roomId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Soft-deletes a room, removing it from active lists while preserving data for restoration. Use the undelete endpoint to restore if needed.

**Prerequisites**
1. **roomId** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the room to delete.
2. Delete: [DELETE /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{roomId\}](/docs/api/locations/delete-location-room).
3. If needed, restore with [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{roomId\}/undelete](/docs/api/locations/undelete-location-room).

**Minimal Required Fields**: roomId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"roomId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The unique identifier of the room to delete"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Room deleted successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response returned after successfully deleting a resource. >
